alert.note: Alert for Chatanika River Valley; Eielson AFB and Salcha; Fairbanks Metro Area; Goldstream Valley and Nenana Hills; Nenana; Tanana Flats; Two Rivers; Upper Chena River Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 5:59AM AKST until January 16 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Upper Chena River Valley. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will taper off this morning. Another round of snow will develop this evening and continue into Tuesday. Increase winds Tuesday afternoon will cause areas of blowing snow Tuesday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chatanika River Valley; Eielson AFB and Salcha; Fairbanks Metro Area; Goldstream Valley and Nenana Hills; Nenana; Tanana Flats; Two Rivers; Upper Chena River Valley
